title: From the Archives: Laverne Cox - How "Orange Is the New Black" Approaches Trans Incarceration
itunes:title: From the Archives: Laverne Cox - How "Orange Is the New Black" Approaches Trans Incarceration
description:
Laverne Cox explains how her show "Orange Is the New Black" portrays transgender women in prison and discusses the push for more LGBT data collection in government surveys.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
